com.crawljax.core

  • Packages that use com.crawljax.core 
    Package Description
    com.crawljax.browser
    This is the core package for the browsers.
    com.crawljax.core
    This is the core package for Crawljax.
    com.crawljax.core.configuration  
    com.crawljax.core.plugin
    This plugin package for Crawljax.
    com.crawljax.core.state
    This is the core package for the state machine.
    com.crawljax.di  
    com.crawljax.forms
    Forms package.

    This interface denotes all the operations a CandidateExtractor can execute.
